messages.subject: Unschooling worries
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/29/03 6:46:29 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  Mary and her
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/29/03 6:46:29 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< What whole Oprah thing?
Mary Ellen >>

Mary and her kids were on the Oprah show a few months back.
I have a nice visual of them now, thanks to the show!!!

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
